bug.author: lerenn
bug.description:
Hi there, There is some misalignment on Firefox with the floating button on bottom right. This doesn't seem to happen with Chromium (I don't really know for other web browsers, Linux here). <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10376004/49109985-7eb5ff80-f28c-11e8-93f4-f95956575f57.png></denchmark-link>
After fix on the left, before fix on the right Regarding <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vuetifyjs/vuetify/issues/5741>this issue</denchmark-link> on Vuetify, it's just two lines in CSS that are not in the correct order. In PhotoPrism, those lines are also not in the correct order. Merge request on its way! :)

comments.comment: Works on Firefox, Chrome & Safari (OS X). Thank you for fixing this!
